Title: shardNum
Description:
Returns the index of a shard which processes a part of data in a distributed query. Indices are started from 1.
If a query is not distributed then constant value 0 is returned.
Examples: CREATE TABLE shard_num_example (dummy UInt8)    ENGINE=Distributed(test_cluster_two_shards_localhost, system, one, dummy);SELECT dummy, shardNum(), shardCount() FROM shard_num_example;
